title: Luminary Tour: Igshaan Adams—Desire Lines
hero_caption: Igshaan Adams. I was a hidden treasure, then I wanted to be known…, 2016. Minneapolis Institute of Art, Gift of Funds from Mary and Bob Mersky. Image courtesy of blank projects, Cape Town. © Igshaan Adams.
short_description: Come together with fellow Luminary members to enjoy a closer look at the tapestries and textiles of Igshaan Adams: Desire Lines.
list_description: Come together with fellow Luminary members to enjoy a closer look at the tapestries and textiles of Igshaan Adams: Desire Lines.
description:
On this guided small-group tour, join fellow Luminary members to explore monumental tapestries and textile installations in Igshaan Adams: Desire Lines.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to twelve participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

Physical distancing and other visiting policies must be observed. Coat and bag check, dining, and valet services are currently unavailable.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
buy_button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to twelve participants.
